title: inspired Christmas biscuits
description: Bring a touch of the Middle East to your biscuits with rosewater and fennel.For this recipe you will need a piping bag fitted  with a plain nozzle and a food processor.
ingredients: 350g/12oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1-3 tsp rosewater, depending on taste and strength
2 tsp fennel seeds, 1 tsp ground and 1 left whole
